name: The Deck of Minds
description:
The capitalist and tyrant company Pear.inc has taken over most of the Old York area. You are the founder of an underground organisation named The Deck of Minds. Your stage name is Ace and you and your 12 other friends named accordingly your task is to stop Pear.inc and give the commonwealth their land back. 

(I know there is a lot of spelling mistakes but im not good with words)
